preface.simpara: Spring Cloud Release Train is a curated set of dependencies across a range of Spring Cloud projects. You consume it by using the spring-cloud-dependencies POM to manage dependencies in Maven or Gradle. The release trains have names, not versions, to avoid confusion with the sub-projects. The names are an alphabetic sequence (so you can sort them chronologically) with names of London Tube stations ("Angel" is the first release, "Brixton" is the second).
